= Introduction =

The !BigBlueButton 0.8 server runs under Ubuntu 10.04 32-bit or 64-bit, as well as distributions listed below.  To setup your own !BigBlueButton server:

    * [BigBlueButtonVM Download the BigBlueButton Virtual Machine]

Configuration files:
